hungarian: Maradjon ki a busztól, hagyja el a buszt

English: to be in time for the bus
to be late for the bus
to add money to the card
hungarian: Töltse be az értéket a kártyára

English: to slide into a full bus
to take hold of the railing
to hold on to the support rod

Finnish: Mikä bussi toi on? Mikä ratikka toi on?
English: What bus is that? What tram is that?
hungarian: Melyik busz hozott? Milyen kerék ez?

English: Can you get to the city center with that bus?
hungarian: Eljuthat -e az a busz a belvárosba?

English: Does this bus go to the city center?
hungarian: Ez a busz a belvárosba megy?

English: [Number 56] doesn't go to the city center.
hungarian: A Viiskatonen nem megy a belvárosba.

English: With what bus are you going?
With what bus can you get there?
You can get there [with bus number 7].
You can get there [with bus number 20].
You can get to Hervanta [with bus 33].
Can we get to Rauhaniemi [with bus 2]?
You can get to Rauhaniemi [with bus 2].
What bus are you waiting for?
Are you waiting [for number 21] as well?
With what bus are you coming?

hungarian: Nem juthat el oda három hoo.

English: There it is (the bus is approaching).
Nobody can fit on the bus anymore.
hungarian: Senki sem fér el a buszon.

English: Move closer to the back (of the bus)!
Squeeze up so other can fit!
Could I get away from here?
I'm getting off at the next stop.
I would like to charge 20 euros to my card.
I would like to charge 30 days to my card.
